title: Birth of an island
brief_description: Shows the formation of the new volcanic island of Surtsey near Iceland, beginning as a submarine eruption and building up to a substantiasl lava shield of several square miles. Covers the changes in activity of the volcano and investigation by landing parties. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
